name: Shawna

topics.response_text: So Dave gave you the okay, huh?  Well, welcome then.
Yeah, and I have to get back to work.
I'd never really thought about that before. Why do you ask?

topics.topic_text: I happen to have some souvenirs from Dave's past for sale.
topics.response_text: Oh, wonderful! I'd be happy to accept your contribution on behalf of the Republic!

topics.topic_text: Well, everything here looks like a piece of junk.
topics.response_text: Sir, everything here is authentic! Dave said so himself!
That's alright. I'm used to the children asking funny questions, anyway.

topics.topic_text: Actually, I think I have all the info I need.
You know, Rosie is running for president now.
topics.response_text: Wow, really?  I've always said that she'd make a great leader, and we've never had a woman lead us before...

topics.topic_text: Have you considered running for the presidency?
topics.response_text: Absolutely not. In fact, I'd vote for Dave twice if I could.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to discuss the election with you.
topics.response_text: Me? I'm not sure if I can help you...

topics.topic_text: You should go vote, if you haven't already.
This guy Dave has his own museum?
topics.response_text: Oh, yes. Everything here is from Dave's adventures in the Wasteland, before he founded the Republic.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to know more about the Republic.
topics.response_text: Sure! The Museum of Dave is happy to answer any questions on behalf of the Republic of Dave's Office of Tourism!

topics.topic_text: That's all I need to know.
What's your take on the Republic?
topics.response_text: The Republic of Dave offers a rich history rivaling that of the great nations before the war.

topics.topic_text: Tell me more about this Dave guy.
topics.response_text: President Dave is the savior of the Wasteland, bringing peace and order to the savages man has brought upon himself.
Dave revised the restrictive marriage laws of the Kingdom of Tom shortly after the Republic was formed.

topics.topic: RDTopicYourselfWhat can you tell me about yourself?
topics.response_text: Me? I just run the museum and teach classes to the little ones. You know, truth, justice, and the will of Dave...
Don't lie to me. Dave would have told me that if it were true.

conversation.topic_text: I'll leave you to the kids.
conversation.response_text: Come back and visit the museum anytime!
Hi Mary.  I mean Flower.  Rachael!
Was I supposed to do it?  I didn't hear Dave saying we had to!
Ah, Dave. Lead our Republic to glory!
So, I'll just get started on the tour of the museum then.

combat.response_text: What wonderful items for the Museum of Dave!

description:
Shawna is a 17 year-old Caucasian Female.

Shawna is the 17-year-old eldest daughter of Dave, the self-proclaimed leader of the Republic of Dave. She serves as the curator of the Museum of Dave and handles the community's education. Having been raised entirely within the Republic, she is fiercely loyal to her father and his vision for their small settlement.

Shawna's Personality: Shawna is earnest, proud, and deeply indoctrinated in her father's beliefs. She takes her responsibilities as curator and teacher seriously, though she lacks experience with the wider wasteland. She can be pragmatic when it comes to the museum's budget, willing to trade at fair value for interesting artifacts. While supportive of her father's leadership, she has been taught basic survival skills in case she ever needs to leave the Republic.

Shawna's Backstory: Born and raised entirely within the Republic of Dave, Shawna has never known life outside her father's small settlement. As the eldest of Dave's children, she has been groomed to take on important responsibilities within the community. From a young age, she was taught the history and values of the Republic, with Dave emphasizing his own heroic tales and the superiority of their way of life. She has been trained in basic combat and survival skills, though she has never had to use them in earnest. As she grew older, Dave entrusted her with running the Museum of Dave and overseeing the education of the other children in the Republic.
